comments.body: If you just call the overloaded `createServer` here, you could just modify the existing constructor in `TransportServer` instead of adding a new one.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -97,6 +97,12 @@ public TransportServer createServer(int port, List<TransportServerBootstrap> boo
     return new TransportServer(this, port, rpcHandler, bootstraps);

@@ -97,6 +97,12 @@ public TransportServer createServer(int port, List<TransportServerBootstrap> boo
     return new TransportServer(this, port, rpcHandler, bootstraps);
